title: (x) Ruby de Mure swashy script - Affair {Marcelo R}
content:
Could someone help me identify this typeface. It haunts my dreams!!!

author: smongey

comments.content: Seán you could have just emailed me! Glad you can sleep well now though.
He was planning to rip you off but thats gone out the window...

\>Seán you could have just emailed me! Glad you can sleep well now though.

You told us before and I didn’t want to wreck your head.  
I was trying to challenge myself to find it and I failed:(

\> <cite>I didn’t want to wreck your head</cite>

Don’t worry about that. Don’t be afraid to email. Best of luck with your end of year show (both of you, you messers!).
We’ll probably spend most of our time here. Typenerding it up!
